title: [娱乐|经济]时间就是金钱 —— 在线获得金钱[1.7-1.12]
author: kevinqyr
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kevinqyr 于 2017-9-19 15:58 编辑 


时间就是金钱 —— 在线获得金钱 
Time Is Money
简介：

时间就是金钱插件可以让你选择多长时间给多少钱和定时执行命令。举个梨子:你可以每十分钟给所有人一个钻石+100金币。
这个插件还有挂机检测功能，如果你在挂机，是不会获得奖励的(可以配置)。
TIM还包含ATM功能!

配置文件：
范例配置文件:
config.yml:
configuration-version: 12

debug-log: false

# You can disable the plugin's payout feature in certain worlds
disabled_in_worlds:
- "creative_world"

# You can define if the player gets a payout whether player is afk or not.
# the permission tim.afkbypass would avoid this for certain user or groups.
afk_payout: false
display-messages-in-chat: true
display-messages-in-actionbar: true
display-messages-in-actionbar-time: 10
give_money_every_second: 600
store-money-in-bank: false

# Payouts will be delivered by "chance" instead "permission".
choose-payout-by-chance: false

# You can add as many payouts you want. You only can choose between "permission"
# and "change", not both.
payouts:
  1:
    payout_amount: 50
    max_payout_per_day: 1000
    # chance: 10
    permission:
  2:
    payout_amount: 100
    max_payout_per_day: 10000
    commands:
      - /give %player% diamond 1
    # chance: 90
    # You can use any permission name you want. e.g. myserver.donor
    permission: tim.vip

# Translations
message: "&aYou earned &c%money% &afor 10 minutes online time!"
message_payoutlimit_reached: "&cYou have reached the payout limit today. You earned 0[        DISCUZ_CODE_0        ]quot;
message_afk: "&cYou havn't earned money because you were afk!"
message_actionbar: "&aYou earned &c%money% &afor 10 minutes online time!"
message_payoutlimit_reached_actionbar: "&cYou have reached the payout limit today. You got 0[        DISCUZ_CODE_0        ]quot;
message_afk_actionbar: "&cYou havn't earned money because you were afk!"
message_atm_noperms: "&cYou don't have the permission to use ATM's!"
message_atm_nomoneyinbank: "&cYou don't have enough money in bank!"
message_atm_nomoney: "&cYou don't have enough money!"

# ATM -> Place down a sign with [atm] on the first line to use it!
enable_atm: true
atm_title: "&cATM"
atm_withdraw: "&cWithdraw"
atm_deposit: "&cDeposit"
atm_balance: "&cBank balance:"

# You can seperate the ATM balances for different worlds by group them. Just set group-atms to true and write atm_groups as described below.
# Note: Existing bank accounts will be removed when enabling this feature.
group-atms: false
# Example groups for seperating all worlds:
#atm_groups:
#  group1:
#  - world
#  group2:
#  - world_nether
#  group3:
#   - world_the_end
# Example groups for seperating skyblock worlds and survival worlds:
#atm_groups:
#  group1:
#  - ASkyblock_world
#  - Askyblock_spawn
#  group2:
#  - survival_world
#  - farm_world复制代码中文译本:
config.yml:
configuration-version: 12

debug-log: false

# 你可以在某个世界取消在线奖励
disabled_in_worlds:
- "creative_world"

# 挂机检测开关
# 给玩家赋予 tim.afkbypass 权限可以避免afk检测
afk_payout: false
display-messages-in-chat: true
display-messages-in-actionbar: true
display-messages-in-actionbar-time: 10
give_money_every_second: 600
store-money-in-bank: false

# 奖励几率 你可以在下面选择很多礼品包, 这个选择就是不是用权限组，随机挑选一个发给玩家
choose-payout-by-chance: false

# 你可以添加无数个礼包，但是你只可以选择 permission 或者 chance 不可以两个同时存在
payouts:
  1:
    payout_amount: 50
    max_payout_per_day: 1000
    # chance: 10
    permission:
  2:
    payout_amount: 100
    max_payout_per_day: 10000
    commands:
      - /give %player% diamond 1
    # chance: 90
    # 你可以使用任意权限名字 比如 awards.package.1
    permission: tim.vip

# Translations
message: "&a你在线十分钟获得了 [        DISCUZ_CODE_203        ]amp;c%money%!"
message_payoutlimit_reached: "&c你今天已经不能再获得奖励 因此你获得 $0"
message_afk: "&c你没有获得任何奖励, 因为你处于AFK模式!"
message_actionbar: "&a你在线十分钟获得了 [        DISCUZ_CODE_203        ]amp;c%money%!"
message_payoutlimit_reached_actionbar: "&c你今天已经不能再获得奖励 因此你获得 $0"
message_afk_actionbar: "&c你没有获得任何奖励, 因为你处于AFK模式!"
message_atm_noperms: "&c你没有权限使用这个功能。"
message_atm_nomoneyinbank: "&c你在银行没有足够的钱了!"
message_atm_nomoney: "&c你没有足够的钱了!"

# ATM -> 请放一个牌子第一行输入 [atm] 来使用
enable_atm: true
atm_title: "&cATM"
atm_withdraw: "&c提现"
atm_deposit: "&c存钱"
atm_balance: "&c余额:"

# 你可以设置每个世界一个ATM存档. 把group-atms改成true就可以了
# 注意： 如果你开启这个选项现有的ATM存档会被删除
group-atms: false
# Example groups for seperating all worlds:
#atm_groups:
#  group1:
#  - world
#  group2:
#  - world_nether
#  group3:
#   - world_the_end
# Example groups for seperating skyblock worlds and survival worlds:
#atm_groups:
#  group1:
#  - ASkyblock_world
#  - Askyblock_spawn
#  group2:
#  - survival_world
#  - farm_world复制代码

指令：
/tim - 重载配置文件/atm <player> - 打开玩家的ATM/atm - 打开ATM
权限：
管理员权限：tim.reload (/tim) - 重载配置文件tim.admin (/atm <player>) - 查看玩家的ATMtim.atm.place - 创建ATM牌子
玩家权限：tim.atm.use - 使用ATM牌子
tim.use (/atm) - 使用权限
